divs: Sighting DetailsI saw and my friend as well two pairs of green and blue lights together like on airplanes, but traveling at extremely fast speeds over the 405 freeway and then over the buildings, it was extremely fast and brightened for a period and then faded in the horizon
Summary: Two Green-Blue lights shoot out of control through the sky
